DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the efficacy of BGG492 in reducing the sensitivity to flashing lights of patients with photosensitive epilepsy, using EEG as a readout.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of BGG492 on EEG in Patients With Photosensitive Epilepsy
DOC.criteria: diagnosis of photosensitive epilepsy inconsistent photoparoxysmal response when stimulated by photic stimulation Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply.
